attributes.action: Support for the National Lobby of Parliament for Palestine on Wednesday 28th November
attributes.additional_details:
As UK citizens we urgently request our MP's to pressure the Israeli Government to end its illegal actions and ongoing human rights abuses against the Palestinians.

On Wednesday 28th November from 2pm-6pm is the National Lobby of Parliament for Palestine day.

This is the best opportunity to make sure that MPs know that Palestine is an issue that matters to their local constituents.

We call for the British Government to act and end Israel's siege and  occupation of Palestine.
We need at least 100,000 signatures to have an impact. Please show your support for human rights!!
